title: CVRD Water South Extension
description:
Council received an update on the Comox Valley Regional District (CVRD) water service extension project for the south corridor. The project would expand treated water supply to areas currently on wells. Staff outlined cost-sharing options and preliminary capital estimates of approximately $12 million.

Actions: Council approved the City's participation in the cost-sharing agreement and authorized the Mayor to sign the inter-municipal agreement subject to final legal review.
